error.socialAppleRequired: Apple login is required for this action.
error.socialAppleInvalid: There was an error with Apple login.
error.socialGoogleRequired: Google login is required for this action.
error.socialGoogleInvalid: There was an error with Google login.
error.passwordMustNew: New password must be different from previous passwords within the past {period} days.
error.passwordNotSet: Password has not been set for this account.
error.twoFactorInvalid: The provided two-factor authentication code is invalid.
error.twoFactorChallengeInvalid: The two-factor challenge is invalid or has expired.
error.twoFactorNotEnabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled for this account.
error.twoFactorCodeRequired: A two-factor authentication code or backup code is required.
error.twoFactorSetupRequired: Start two-factor setup before confirming the code.
error.twoFactorAttemptTemporaryLock: Too many incorrect two-factor attempts. Two-factor authentication is temporarily locked. Please try again after {retryAfterSeconds}s.
